entry.source: I've been asked by the fairies to summon a{F801}demon called {F804,5}Black Maria.{F804,0} The problem is,{F801}an army of angels has appeared, and they're{F801}preventing me from doing the summoning.{F801}If you'll help, come to {F804,5}St. Nicholas{F801}Cathedral north of Tokyo station{F804,0} to meet me.{F801}
